definition: Taya township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: His remarks trespassed the bounds of good taste.
His mother's name was Zebidah daughter of Pedaiah; she was from Rumah.
sentences.chinese: 他母親名叫西布大，是魯瑪人毗大雅的女兒。

sentences.english: Of the priests: Jedaiah the son of Joiarib, Jachin.
sentences.chinese: 祭司中有雅斤，又有約雅立的兒子耶大雅。

sentences.english: Western painting too real in the eyes of the Chinese people, unrefined.
sentences.chinese: 西畫在中國人眼裏太實，不登大雅之堂。

sentences.english: After him Pedaiah the son of Parosh.
sentences.chinese: 其次是巴錄的兒子毗大雅修造。

sentences.english: They Laojiaoqing, more open and harmless joke.
sentences.chinese: 他們是老交情，開些玩笑並無傷大雅。

sentences.english: His mother's name was Jedidah daughter of Adaiah; she was from Bozkath.
sentences.chinese: 他母親名叫耶底大，是波斯加人亞大雅的女兒。

sentences.english: His manners transgressed the bounds of good taste.
It was just a harmless prank, that's all it was.
sentences.chinese: 那僅是一次無傷大雅的惡作劇，僅次而已。

sentences.english: And his mother's name was Jedidah, the daughter o…
sentences.chinese: 他母親名叫耶底大，是波斯加人亞大雅的女兒。

sentences.english: Consume whole cereals or bread made from whole unrefined cereals.
sentences.chinese: 製成麪包或全穀類全穀類不登大雅之堂。

sentences.english: And next unto them repaired Jedaiah the son of Harumaph, even over against his house.
sentences.chinese: 其次是哈路抹的兒子耶大雅對著自己的房屋修造。

sentences.english: But why at this point, still difficult to ascend the place of refinement?
sentences.chinese: 但爲什麼時至今日，依然難登大雅之堂？

sentences.english: And those little tree spirits with the bobbling heads certainly don't hurt either.
sentences.chinese: 還有那些搖頭晃腦的小樹精當然也無傷大雅。

sentences.english: In this case, it is the unrefined carbohydrates.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，它是不登大雅之堂的碳水化合物。

sentences.english: And his mother's name was Jedidah, the daughter of Adaiah of Boscath.
sentences.chinese: 他母親名叫耶底大，是波斯加人亞大雅的女兒。
